sentence: Nueva convocatoria para reunir a los egresados de la Universidad Politécnica de Cartagena que visitan la Región durante el verano.
translation: New call to gather the graduates of the Polytechnic University of Cartagena who visit the Region during the summer.

sentence: La asociación Alumni UPCT ha organizado su tercera jornada Networking al sol, que tendrá lugar el próximo día 14.
translation: The Alumni UPCT association has organized its third 'Networking in the sun' event, which will take place on the 14th.

sentence: En esta ocasión, los alumni de la UPCT tienen previsto navegar a partir de las 18:00 horas a bordo de un dragón boat por la dársena de Cartagena.
translation: On this occasion, the UPCT alumni are scheduled to sail from 6:00 p.m. on a dragon boat through the Cartagena dock.

sentence: La jornada finalizará con una cena en el Real Club de Regatas.
translation: The day will end with a dinner at the Royal Regatta Club.

sentence: En este encuentro pueden participar socios Alumni y simpatizantes.
translation: Alumni members and supporters can participate in this meeting.

sentence: Para participar es necesario enviar un Whatsapp al 868071193 o un correo electrónico a alumni@upct.es
translation: To participate, it is necessary to send a WhatsApp to 868071193 or an email to alumni@upct.es.

sentence: La mayoría de los socios Alumni son trabajadores, empresarios y autónomos de la Región de Murcia.
translation: Most of the Alumni members are workers, businessmen, and self-employed individuals from the Region of Murcia.

sentence: Pueden asociarse tanto egresados como personas que quieran estar vinculados a la UPCT.
translation: Both graduates and individuals who want to be linked to the UPCT can join.
